@DavidJMoorecom Was your initial term for 36 months? Anything lower than 36 months (our default) will result in a higher 'normal', aka monthly, cost. Likewise any services which exceed a 36 month term are also at a lower monthly rate.

@DavidJMoorecom Hello! Just so that you are informed, the 'normally' amount can also change depending on length of term. So the displayed amount reflects the 'normal' amount for the default term, not all terms.
